title: When i change put my new email and password it says password incorrect but the password write.
body: When i change put my new email and password it says password incorrect but the password written correctly, I forgot my old one so i cant acces it so i want to change but it says this.

replies.body: If you are having trouble logging in, there are few steps you can take to troubleshoot!  First and foremost, make sure you have the correct region selected.  You can also use our[ account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to get back in.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
